nodes.text: Redgill Lake was a lake on the planet of Dathomir. The Raining Leaves Clan and Broken Columns Clan held their annual meeting near this lake. In 43.5 ABY, their conclave near here, although it had to be moved to another nearby location, Bright Sun Hill, due to various attacks by Nightsisters. The hill was later attacked by Nightsisters, but the Clans managed to defeat their assailants.
